name: @nationalbankbelgium/ngx-form-errors
description: Display validation errors for Angular Reactive forms
author: Stark Team <National Bank of Belgium>

scripts.build: ng build -c production && cd dist && npm pack ./ --silent && cd ..
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:demo:ng-previous && npm run clean:demo:ng-latest
scripts.clean:demo:ng-previous: cd demo-app/ng7 && npm run clean && cd ..
scripts.clean:demo:ng-latest: cd demo-app/ng8 && npm run clean && cd ..
scripts.clean:modules:all: npm run clean:modules && npm run clean:modules:demo:ng-previous && npm run clean:modules:demo:ng-latest
scripts.clean:modules:demo:ng-previous: cd demo-app/ng7 && npm run clean:modules && cd ..
scripts.clean:modules:demo:ng-latest: cd demo-app/ng8 && npm run clean:modules && cd ..
scripts.clean:slate: npm run clean:all && npm run clean:modules:all && npm run install:all
scripts.docs: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:generate
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run build && npm run install:demo:ng-previous && npm run install:demo:ng-latest
scripts.install:ci:demo:ng-previous: npm run build && cd demo-app/ng7 && npm ci && cd ..
scripts.install:ci:demo:ng-latest: npm run build && cd demo-app/ng8 && npm ci && cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run lint-ts && npm run lint-css
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run lint:demo:ng-previous && npm run lint:demo:ng-latest
scripts.lint:demo:ng-previous: cd demo-app/ng7 && npm run lint && cd ..
scripts.lint:demo:ng-latest: cd demo-app/ng8 && npm run lint && cd ..
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:demo:ng-previous && npm run test:demo:ng-latest
scripts.test:ci:all: npm run test:ci && npm run test:ci:demo:ng-previous && npm run test:ci:demo:ng-latest
scripts.test:ci:demo:ng-previous: cd demo-app/ng7 && npm run test:ci && cd ../..
scripts.test:ci:demo:ng-latest: cd demo-app/ng8 && npm run test:ci && cd ../..
scripts.update:demo:ng-previous: npm run clean:demo:ng-previous && npx rimraf ./node_modules/@nationalbankbelgium && npm run install:demo:ng-previous
scripts.update:demo:ng-latest: npm run clean:demo:ng-latest && npx rimraf ./node_modules/@nationalbankbelgium && npm run install:demo:ng-latest
